title: Jelly Missile
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1"

|1||Each time you are injured by a [[jelly]]-edible projectile, there is a 67% chance that you will be healed for 1d(damage received).||You have a small jelly attached to you that may absorb projectiles.
